General.Name: China Publishing & Media Hldg
General.Description: China Publishing & Media Holdings Co., Ltd. publishes books, newspapers, periodicals, audio-visual products, and electronic and Internet publications in China. It is also involved in the paper and digital publishing, printing and reproduction, and copyright trade activities. In addition, the company offers information services. China Publishing & Media Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 55 A Chaoyangmennei Street, Beijing, China, 100010
